chapters.title: Beneath the Surface
chapters.content: The kid lay in their bed, wondering what the future would bring. From the depths of the ship, a low humming resonated, a promise of the vast space that was just beyond. Outside, a space dock highlighted the enormity of the journey ahead, with constellations of humanity drifting about its perimeter.
chapters.illustration: A young child lying comfortably in a white, futuristic-looking bed, snuggled into their sheets, looking toward a large, round window that is showing the dark expanse of the void.

chapters.title: The Stars Are Everywhere
chapters.content: As the kid's eyes grew heavier and lighter, a tranquil sight graced the vision of the window. A vast galaxy of stars cast a million sparkling galaxies in their wake, beckoning the expedition to the distant places hidden beyond. The kid knew that the journey would be difficult, but a strange new frontier awaited them.
chapters.illustration: The window of the ship reveals galaxies of stars, their colors blazing and their light setting the scene.

chapters.title: The AI Awaits
chapters.content: The kid soon found solace in their dream as a knowing voice in their earmorph announced the approach of their voyage. 'All systems go', it declared, 'We are now ready to begin.' As the crew of AI awakened, the kid knew the rest of the voyage wouldn't be too long.
chapters.illustration: A closeup of the child's face, illuminated by a small light emanating from the mouthpiece of their earmorph.

messages.name: BB
Alex
messages.content:
"""
story outline: Tell me a bedtime story from the future - a kid is going to bed on a spaceship docked at the surface of a large planned. The kid and their family are leaving on a new frontier and they will be sleeping through most of the journey. A helpful AI crew would steer the ship and wake them up when they arrive
"""

messages.name: Assy
